name: data-card-02
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
